Luke Plutowski

            Bio
            I am a Senior Statistician at LAPOP Lab at Vanderbilt
            University, where I coordinate nationwide surveys in four
            countries, lead data visualization tasks, present results
            for non-technical audiences, and head lab research on
            statistics and survey methodology. I have experience with in
            R, Stata, Tableau, SQL, and Python, and I excel at project
            management and written communication.
            
            
            Experience
            LAPOP Lab at Vanderbilt University |
            Nashville, TN
            Senior Statistician | January 2022 –
            Statistician II | September 2020 – January 2022
            
            
            Education
            University of Illinois |
            Urbana-Champaign, IL
            Ph.D. in Political Science | August 2020
            M.S. in Statistics | May 2020
            M.A. in Political Science | August 2018
            University of Minnesota |
            Minneapolis-St. Paul, MN
            B.A. in Political Science | May 2014
